about_the_game:
Insect Dude! Underground Roots is a 2D-3D hybrid story-driven top-down shooter where the protagonist is trapped underground at the size of a bug and has to battle other insects while trying to find a way to return to normal.

In the journey he will discover a few dark secrets from a whole new perspective and.....

....maybe he isn't as alone as he might think...


  • Root Traveling: Navigate through the underground ecosystem through the tree's roots using your suit's technology. Every level hides new challenges and secrets.

  • Special Abilities: Unlock and upgrade equipment in your suit that allows you to defeat enemies in different ways.

  • Adaptive Music: The music system smoothly adapts to your current situation, setting the right mood whether you are in a battle or just exploring.

  • Discover Secrets: Every step deeper brings unexpected hazards and escalating dangers, as well as many secrets... Find out what happened.

  • F U N.

Green Industries is one of the most technologically advanced companies in the world. Its founder, Nathaniel Green, has been missing for the past two years, and no one knows what has happened to him.

Despite this, the company has continued to thrive. One of the local labs is owned by Arthur Drake, a brilliant scientist specializing in atomic distances and nanotechnology.

He commissioned a special suit from a colleague to implement his theory, but during testing, something went wrong. As a result, he has shrunk down to the size of an insect and must now rely on the roots of a tree to travel and find a way out.


In Insect Dude! Underground Roots, the gameplay focuses on exploring underground environments, eliminating enemies, and navigating through unique challenges in a 2D-3D hybrid setting. Players control the protagonist from a top-down perspective, navigating through an alien-like world with hostile insects and environmental hazards. Combat emphasizes quick reflexes and strategic use of each weapon and ability at the player's disposal, allowing players to shoot, dodge, and adapt to the fast-paced threats of each area.

The gameplay also integrates platforming elements at certain phases, requiring players to make precise movements across obstacles while maintaining situational awareness. As players progress, they uncover equipment upgrades and environmental interactions that aid in survival, adding depth and variation to each level. Environmental sound cues and visual indicators are essential, providing hints for direction and foreshadowing upcoming dangers. This blend of combat, exploration, and tactical movement creates a layered experience, pushing players to adapt to an evolving underground ecosystem.

  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: ALSA or PulseAudio compatible sound device
